sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
Note: **This article or section does not follow the Laptop page guidelines.** This article or section does not follow the Laptop page guidelines.

This article or section does not follow the Laptop page guidelines.

Table content:
Hardware | PCI/USB ID | Working?
Mobile broadband |  | Yes
Wireless |  | Yes
Bluetooth |  | Yes
Audio |  | No
Touchpad |  | Yes
Touchscreen |  | No
Webcam |  | Yes

sections.title: Firmware
sections.content:
- disable hardware write-protection by booting without battery
- only SeaBIOS (no CoreBoot with UEFI) by https://mrchromebox.tech/#devices

sections.title: System Settings
sections.content:
